lines.text: [Joe notices a girl on a poster advertising sex on the side of a bus]
Hey, the girl on that poster looks like your daughter.
Yeah! (looks at it a second time) That IS my daughter.
[Trying to identify a suspect Nash spoke to on the phone]
Joe, you remember that electronic tone we heard when I was talking on the phone? You think he could be wearing a hearing aid?
What?
You think he could be wearing a hearing aid?
What?
You think he could... oh, very funny.
[Nash is recovering from amnesia]
Hey, Nash! You still remember who I am, don't you?
Okay! Listen! Everybody, listen! I remember everybody. Alright? I didn't hit my head that hard.
Hey, Nash, you remember me?
You I meant to forget.
Nash, the most high-tech thing on this computer is the flying toaster screen saver.
[Nash and Joe go after a guy who attacked them with a monster truck]
Can't we take a bigger car? Or a bus, perhaps?
[about Harvey]
Jerry Garcia's been dead for months. When's he going to take off that armband?
Probably when his LSD runs out.
[Antoine breaks into a car to dispose of the bomb in the trunk]
Antoine, what are you doing?
Misspent youth!
Nash! Where have you been? Why didn't you call?
My cel-phone battery was dead. I was out on the water.
I... I... why didn't you call?
I told you. My battery was dead.
Man, you had us so scared! You should've called!
Hey, am I speaking English?
Well, we thought you were dead!
[Nash laughs]
You thought I was dead 'cause I didn't call?
No, we thought you were dead 'cause of the massive explosion up at the storage yard!
[Nash looks at Joe in shock]
The whole place went up. There's nothing left.
Not the 'Cuda! The 'Cuda's gone?
No, the 'Cuda's fine.
